org.gridlab.gridsphere.services.file.logical
Interface LogicalFileBrowserService

All Superinterfaces:
FileBrowserService, FileTaskService, org.gridlab.gridsphere.portlet.service.PortletService, TaskSubmissionService
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractLogicalFileBrowserService, LogicalFileBrowserServiceImpl
public interface LogicalFileBrowserService
extends FileBrowserService

Describes a service for browing logical file resources. The logical file browser service extends the file browser service to support logical file browsing tasks.

Method Summary

          Returns a file browser for the given user.
